QuestData.Title: Super Strong Metal Plates!
QuestData.Description: I need metal to patch these tanks up! Super strong metal plates can be found scattered about all across Garrosh's Landing and at the bottom of the bay.$B$BJust be careful when you're out there searching for plates. The mist is... um... AGGRESSIVE! The mist is what took out the landing and the adjoining tuskarr town. Poor little tuskarr...
QuestData.LogDescription: Mobu at the Coast of Echoes in the Borean Tundra wants you to collect 10 Super Strong Metal Plates.
QuestData.RewardText: Great work, buddy! Now where'd I put that pneumatic tank transjigamarig.
